cells.data:
## Purpose

The purpose of this PCR is to clone the Eve-striped 2 enhancer region from three montium species with the eventual goal to add to an MS2 reporter construct to be transformed into _D. melanogaster_. More information in [eve locus](quiver-note-url/3E5FE202-7F6E-41DE-AB96-518E4A78AE7E).

The ligation did not work for the ES2 construct so I basially repeated PCR5 with new reverse primer with a longer tail `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`.

Also, PCRCM007 did not work, so I am adding a gradient to see if the primers need a specific annealing temperature.

## DNA extraction 

I used the genomic DNA extract method given to me from Allie. It is based off the Qiagen Gentra Puregene Handbook for purification of archive quality DNA using the "tissue" protocol. Extracted on August 15, 2016.

### PCR CM004 birch
1-5
DNA: _Drosophila birchii_ 
Primers: `Dbir_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

### PCR CM004 bock
6-10
DNA: _Drosophila bocki_ 
Primers: `Dboc_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

### PCR CM004 jam
10-15
DNA: _Drosophila jambulina_ 
Primers: `Druf_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

## PCR Set-up 

Used Gotaq

## Program - Gradient

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | Gradient   | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |

Repeat Steps 2 - 4: 30X

###Step 3 Temp

1. 54.4
2. 56.7
3. 59.3
4. 62.0
5. 64.7

## Results

![Screen Shot 2016-08-31 at 3.56.19 PM.png](quiver-image-url/1F62E0DF6702EF3E29A894079DD54A35.png)

I bet I just didn't set up PCR CM007 right. This looks good.  I am going to just pool the products of jambulina and birchii and clean up.  Then I am going to run bocki at a higher temperature.  This sucks.
